thread.title: Are sobriety coaches only for celebrities like Robert Downey Jnr?
thread.title_full: Are sobriety coaches only for celebrities like Robert Downey Jnr?

title: Are sobriety coaches only for celebrities like Robert Downey Jnr?
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Are sobriety coaches only for celebri... Are sobriety coaches only for celebrities like Robert Downey Jnr? Next Story Prev Story 28 min ago Read more: The Age 
We've got personal trainers to help us reach fitness goals, life coaches to help get our lives sorted - and now here come sobriety coaches, the people who help you stay on the wagon once you've quit alcohol or drugs. They're an emerging trend in Australia with just a handful of coaches offering services - often people who've overcome substance abuse themselves. Start the conversation, or Read more at The Age.
